name: highest-voice
description: Smart Contract and an UI for Playing the loudest sound without censorship

scripts.dev:local: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npx hardhat node" "sleep 5 && NETWORK=local node scripts/deploy-and-sync.js && npm --prefix ui run dev"
scripts.dev:sepolia: NETWORK=sepolia node scripts/deploy-and-sync.js && npm --prefix ui run dev
scripts.dev:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet node scripts/deploy-and-sync.js && npm --prefix ui run dev

author: Erfan.norozi54@gmail.com
